Text:
There have been issues regarding this. There was a [major discussion on this in another SO Question.][1] The poster had also contacted the main creator of cocos2d for a resolution.

[See his own answer on that post.][2]

Whenever I want to include UIKit elements, I tend to do it the other way round. 

With the CCUIViewWrapper code at: https://github.com/splhack/CCUIViewWrapper


  [1]: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12168079/multiple-opengl-views-cocos2d
  [2]: http://stackoverflow.com/a/12311585/1505757
